full_summary:
Vehicle Repair and Maintenance Services for DND
==============================

### General Information

* Title: Vehicle Repair and Maintenance Services for DND
* Reference Number: cb-744-48088478
* Amendment Number: 3
* Solicitation Number: W6399-24LP56/A
* Publication Date: 2023-10-25
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-24 14:00:00

### Job Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires maintenance and repair services for gas-powered and electric on/off road vehicles (e.g., motorcycles, bicycles, ATVs, UTVs, and snowmobiles), and light equipment (e.g., snow blowers, generators, outboard motors, and small engines).

### Work Categories

Several Standing Offers may be issued as a result of this Request for Standing Offer. The work categories involved in this project include:

* Vehicle Maintenance and Repair Services
* Equipment Maintenance and Repair Services

### Period of the Standing Offer

The term of each Standing Offer will be for three (3) years from the date of issuance, with the option to extend the period by two (2) additional one (1) year periods.

### Tender Details

* Tender Method: Competitive Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is open to suppliers from countries that have signed trade agreements with Canada, including:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Documents

The purchase documents are available in English and French. Bidders must refer to the tender attachment for additional information.

### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns, please contact Mariela Ileto at mariela.ileto@forces.gc.ca or (613) 945-2746. 

### Attachments

Download the complete request for Standing Offer in your first official language by clicking on one of the following links:

* [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/t
